Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by Cleveland in 1975...
Had first career hit on 8/9/1980, off Bill Atkinson (CHW)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 9/10/1981...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/1982, off Tom Seaver (CAL)...
Injured on 4/13/1986 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 9/21/1988...
